short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A helper extension for SMC students

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pico is a browser extension designed to enhance the SMC student experience. It provides important information about professors and courses, making it easier for students to make informed decisions about their course selections.

Install Pico and take the guesswork out of course selection!
